title: BRIEF-Quorum Health Says As Of March 31, Co Incurred About $13.7 Mln Of Costs Related To Closure Of Affinity
text:
Market News May 10, 2018 / 10:24 AM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Quorum Health Says As Of March 31, Co Incurred About $13.7 Mln Of Costs Related To Closure Of Affinity Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 10 (Reuters) - Quorum Health Corp:
* QUORUM HEALTH SAYS AS OF MARCH 31, CO INCURRED ABOUT $13.7 MILLION OF COSTS RELATED TO CLOSURE OF AFFINITY - SEC FILING
* QUORUM HEALTH - SEES IN 2018 TO INCUR COSTS, BEYOND ALREADY INCURRED, OF ABOUT $2.5 MILLION TO $3.5 MILLION RELATED TO WIND DOWN, TRANSFER OF AFFINITY ASSETS Source text: [ bit.ly/2G3rFsJ ] Further company coverage:
